name: Ropivacaine Hydrochloride
indications: ropivacaine hydrochloride injection indicated production local regional anesthesia surgery acute pain management . surgical anesthesia : epidural block surgery including cesarean section ; major nerve block ; local infiltration . acute pain management : epidural continuous infusion intermittent bolus , e.g . , postoperative labor ; local infiltration .
warningsAndPrecautions: ropivacaine hydrochloride injection usp , 2 mg/ml clear , colourless solution filled infusion bag . ml contains 2 mg ropivacaine hydrochloride , usp . available follows : strength unit sale 200 mg/100 ml ( 2 mg/ml ) ndc 70121-1732-1 1 single-dose infusion bag overwrap ndc 70121-1732-9 unit 24 ndc 70121-1732-3 unit 12 400 mg/200 ml ( 2 mg/ml ) ndc 70121-1733-1 1 single-dose infusion bag overwrap ndc 70121-1733-9 unit 24 ndc 70121-1733-3 unit 12 ropivacaine hydrochloride injection usp , 5 mg/ml clear , colourless solution filled infusion bag . ml contains 5 mg ropivacaine hydrochloride , usp . available follows : strength unit sale 500 mg/100 ml ( 5 mg/ml ) ndc 70121-1734-1 1 single-dose infusion bag overwrap ndc 70121-1734-7 unit 10 ndc 70121-1734-3 unit 12 1,000 mg/200 ml ( 5 mg/ml ) ndc 70121-1735-1 1 single-dose infusion bag overwrap ndc 70121-1735-7 unit 10 ndc 70121-1735-3 unit 12 100 ml 200 ml infusion bags made natural rubber latex , non-pvc , non-dehp dual pp ports . storage store 20º 25°c ( 68º 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . products intended single-dose free preservatives . discard unused portion .
adverseReactions: ropivacaine hydrochloride contraindicated patients known hypersensitivity ropivacaine local anesthetic agent amide type .
indications_original:
Ropivacaine hydrochloride injection is indicated for the production of local or regional anesthesia for surgery and for acute pain management.
                  
                     Surgical Anesthesia: Epidural block for surgery including cesarean section; major nerve block; local infiltration.
                  
                     Acute Pain Management: Epidural continuous infusion or intermittent bolus, e.g., postoperative or labor; local infiltration.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ropivacaine Hydrochloride Injection USP, 2 mg/mL is clear, colourless solution filled in infusion bag. Each mL contains 2 mg ropivacaine hydrochloride, USP.                   The 100 mL and 200 mL infusion bags are not made with natural rubber latex, non-PVC, and Non-DEHP with dual PP ports.
                  
                     
                        Storage
                     
                  
                  Store at 20º to 25°C (68º to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  These products are intended for single-dose and are free from preservatives. Discard Unused Portion.
adverseReactions_original: Ropivacaine hydrochloride is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to ropivacaine or to any local anesthetic agent of the amide type.
